attributes.action: Declare result of EU Referendum void owing to lies being used during campaign
attributes.background: The result of the referendum was clearly driven by people voting on the basis of misleading information. The far reaching implications of the leave vote mean that parliament should continue the debate and, if necessary, hold a further referendum when true facts are understood.

rejection.details: We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
